_comment: Example manifest for auto video editor - Edit this file with your settings
_speed_comment: Speed multiplier: 1.0 = normal, 1.2 = 20% faster (recommended for engagement)
_silence_comment: Remove silence: true = remove silent parts, false = keep all audio
_jumpcut_comment: Jump cut threshold: seconds of pause to remove (0.3 = 300ms)
_effects_comment: Core engagement features (ALWAYS ON for professional YouTube videos!)
_music_comment: Background music with smooth blending (ENABLED for engagement!)
_ai_comment: AI features: subtitle extraction and YouTube metadata generation
_processing_comment: Chunk duration: seconds per chunk (300 = 5 min, lower for slower PCs)
